product_name: Arc'teryx Zeta LT Hybrid Jacket - Men's
long_description: Carry the ultralight men's Arc'teryx Zeta LT Hybrid Jacket for emergency storm protection. The waterproof/breathable shell employs two types of GORE-TEX(R) fabric for optimal performance. Main body uses compact, windproof GORE-TEX fabric with PacLite(R) technology. 3-layer GORE-TEX with tricot technology reinforces high-wear areas. Low-profile hood with 1-handed cinch cords stows in the collar for a clean look when the hood isn't needed; hood rotates with your head so it won't block your vision. WaterTight(TM) pit zippers vent excess heat quickly. Hand pockets feature laminated WaterTight zippers. Laminated dropped-back hem has an adjustable drawcord. The Arc'teryx Zeta LT Hybrid Jacket features extended length for enhanced coverage and protection.
short_description: Carry the ultralight men's Arc'teryx Zeta LT Hybrid Jacket for emergency storm protection. The waterproof/breathable shell employs two types of GORE-TEX(R) fabric for optimal performance.
